{{html:
<h1>{[bucket.name]}</h1>

<div class="widget big-stats-container stacked">
    <div class="widget-content">
        <div id="big_stats" class="cf">
            <div class="stat">{[bucket.status]}</div>
            <div class="stat">{[bucket.plan]}</div>
            <div class="stat">{[bucket.region]}</div>
            <div class="stat">{[bucket.image]}</div>

        </div>
    </div>
</div>
<div class="tabbable">
    <ul class="nav nav-tabs">
        <li class="active">
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#power">Power</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Plan">Plan</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Snapshots">Snapshots</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Backups">Backups</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Settings">Settings</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Monitoring">Monitoring</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#Destroy">Destroy</a>
        </li>
        <li >
            <a data-toggle="tab" href="#History">History</a>
        </li>
    </ul>
    <div class="tab-content">
        <div id="power" class="tab-pane active">
            <h3>Power control</h3>
            <button class="btn btn-info btn-large" ng-show="bucket.status == 'active'" ng-click="bucket.powerOff()">Power Off</button>
            <button class="btn btn-info btn-large" ng-show="bucket.status != 'active'" ng-click="bucket.boot()">Boot</button>
        </div>

        <div id="Plan" class="control-group tab-pane">
            <h3>Choose your Plan</h3>
            <div class="controls shortcuts">{{include:plan_list}}</div>
            <br>
            <br>
            <br>
            <input class="btn btn-info btn-large " type="submit" value="Resize" ng-click="bucket.resize()" />
        </div>
        <div id="Snapshots" class="tab-pane">
            <h3>Manage & create Snapshots</h3>
            <h4>Take a Snapshot</h4>
            <div ng-show="bucket.status == 'off'">
                Snapshot name:
                <input class="input-large"  ng-model='newSnapshot.name' type="text"  placeholder="Snapshot Name"/>
                <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"  type="submit" value="Create snapshot" ng-click="createSnapshot()" />
            </div>
            <div ng-show="bucket.status == 'active'">You must turn the bucket off before creating snapshot</div>
            <hr>

            <h4>Restore from Snapshot</h4>
            <table class="table table-bordered table-striped">
                <thead>
                    <tr>
                        <th>Select</th>
                        <th>Name</th>
                    </tr>
                </thead>
                <tbody>
                    <tr ng-repeat="snapshot in snapshots">
                        <td>
                            <input type="radio" name="snapshot" ng-model="selectedSnapshot" value="{[snapshot.name]}" />
                        </td>
                        <td width="89%">{[snapshot.name]}</td>
                    </tr>
                </tbody>
            </table>

            <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"  type="submit" value="Restore" ng-click="restoreSnapshot()" />
        </div>
        <div id="Backups" class="tab-pane">
            <h3>Backups</h3>
            <h4>Coming soon...</h4>

        </div>
        <div id="Settings" class="control-group tab-pane">
            <h3>Settings</h3>
            <h4>Image</h4>
            <div class="controls shortcuts">
                {{include:image_list}}
                <input class="btn btn-info btn-large"   type="submit" value="Change image" ng-click="bucket.save()" />
            </div>
            <br>
            <br>
            <hr>
            <h4>Rename</h4>
            New name:
            <input  class="input-large" ng-model='bucket.name' type="text" placeholder="New Name"/>
            <input class="btn btn-info btn-large" type="submit" value="Change name" ng-click="bucket.save()" />

        </div>
        <div id="Monitoring" class="tab-pane">
            <h3>Monitoring</h3>
            <p>
                CPU Utilization
}}
      {{jgauge: id:1 width:200 height:114 start:0 end:100 val:40 random:10 style:black labelsuffix:%}}

{{html:
            </p>
        </div>
        <div id="Destroy" class="tab-pane">
            <h3>Destroy</h3>
            <p>
                warning message goes here warning message goes here warning message goes here
            </p>
            <hr>
            <input class="btn btn-danger btn-large"  ng-click="bucket.remove()" name="commit" type="submit" value="Destroy"></input>
    </div>
    <div id="History" class="tab-pane">
        <h3>History</h3>
        <table class="table table-bordered table-striped" ng-show="bucket.history.length > 0">
            <thead>
                <tr>
                    <th>Event</th>
                    <th>Initiated</th>
                    <th>Execution Time</th>
                </tr>
            </thead>
            <tbody>
                <tr ng-repeat="history in bucket.history">
                    <td>{[history.event]}</td>
                    <td>{[history.initiated]}</td>
                    <td>{[history.user]}</td>
                </tr>
            </tbody>
        </table>
    </div>
</div>
</div>
}}
